name: The Cursed Temple
description:
Hi! I'm Kevin (aka Big Time), and this game was made for a Unity class I did in college.

The project was completed with free assets from the Unity Store, models from Mixamo or created in Adobe Fuse, and music lifted from Toby Fox's Deltarune (hence why I would never dream of charging money for this game).

This is just a simple school project, so please treat this less as a sellable product and more as a personal demonstration of my ability with Unity.
